Spatial analysis, cartography, and design for an Earth Economics study on recreation in Washington State Parks.
<!--more-->

![Report graphic depicting economic effects](/img/waparks_generalfund.jpg)

**Skills and tools:** *ArcGIS, QGIS, Google BigQuery, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe InDesign, network analysis*

##### Contributions
* Created maps depicting economic impacts of recreation
* Generated 50 mi road networks to estimate population served by State Parks and to refine economic contribution analysis
* Tabulated landcover within parks for ecosystem service valuation

You can find the final report [here.](https://www.eartheconomics.org/all-publications/2021/wa-stateparks)
